website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a maternity pillow that provides targeted support without being overly firm and has a smaller design than others in its class, the Boppy is likely to impress you.
pros: This pillow's smaller design stands out among competitors for taking up less space
The unique shape can be used to support different areas of the body
cons: May not be ideal for users who prefer a firmer pillow, as the fill is on the softer side
Material may lose shape over time

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the large pregnancy pillows that wrap around the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been a savior for me during my pregnancy! I didn't like the large pregnancy pillows that wrap around the whole body as I felt they were very overwhelming and hard to flip from side to side in middle of the night without waking up the whole neighborhood. I decided to try this pillow and it has worked so well! I change sides a million times every night and it is so much easier to flip over in the middle of the night without getting tangled in blankets and a giant pregnancy pillow. I also like being able to place this pillow in different areas that I feel I need a little extra support!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different pillows and nothing worked for me except for this pillow. This is just a saver for me! Even before pregnancy I tend to sleep with a pillow, just kinda hugging it. When I tried othe maternityr pillows I didn't like the idea of having a pregnancy.pullow instead of your regular comfy pillow. So all U shape and C shape were complete disasters for me. But then I found this little cosy pillow. It supports my belly and I can hug it as well =) However, I must point out that I'm still using additional pillow to put it between my knees. It's just more comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great pregnancy pillow
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a pillow to help keep me on my side comfortably (am a back sleeper) I found this pillow. It's very soft. Because it's smaller, it won't take up your whole bed like a full pregnancy pillow (my husband was very grateful for that!). Both the pillow and cover can be machine washed. So far I've washed the pillow cover a few times. It does pill after a few washes. Highly recommend as it will keep your hips aligned while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: RNNP

customer_reviews.title: Love the pillow at first. Quickly gets flat.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This pillow has lost all fluff in just a few months of use. I wish the filling stayed more firm longer. If I got this in the beginning of my pregnancy instead of the middle, it would be completely useless by now in the third trimester. Knocking off a star from my review bc the pillow has not held up. I still have a month or so to go too. Love the pillow. Works great. I didn’t want a huge pillow since I’m due in the summer and live in the hot south. I wish the pillow was more firm. I’m pretty sure this thing will be flat by the time I get to 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sumati

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the stuffing?
customer_reviews.text: Well... it’s ok. I had hoped it would be a lot firmer? Plushier? Kind of feels like I’m staying over someone’s house sleeping with a 10 yr old pillow. Way too flimsy. I have to fold it in half before putting it between my legs in order to get any hip support. Wouldn’t re-purchase. I’ll give it to my cats once the baby is born. Update: Even my cats won’t want it. Should of paid another $20 & got a snoogle. I’m shocked at how terrible this pillow is considering I love my nursing boppy
customer_reviews.author: Bules

customer_reviews.title: Third Trimester Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those hard-to-sleep nights! Which is every night right now. I'm 32 weeks pregnant with my second and this pillow has been a lifesaver. I bought a Snoogle initially, but trying to maneuver myself and that huge thing every time I had to roll over was ridiculous. This one is small enough to easily move with me as I awkwardly roll over. I alternate between using the big and little ends between my legs. The big end is a bit fuller, so gives my hips a little more support.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy, breastfeeding and beyond!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I’ve ever bought. This pillow was great for support when sleeping pregnant and didn’t take up the whole bed like those huge pregnancy pillows. I bought this for a long haul flight (pre-Covid) and it was perfect. Since having my baby this pillow is perfect for breastfeeding. Seriously don’t bother buying a separate breastfeeding pillow. And now my baby is 6 months, it’s the perfect crash mat to put behind her as she’s learning to sit upright. This pillow just keeps giving! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great compact shape if you just need a little support between knees
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow and even though I’m not pregnant anymore, I can’t sleep without it. The stuffing does tend to clump and requires a “re-fluff” every now and again. I like the smaller shape that fits just between my knees and under my belly. Those giant noodle pillows were always so cumbersome and annoying every time you need to readjust in your sleep. I don’t understand why it’s soooo pricey, probably be cause it’s the Boppy name brand. But it’s the only one like it and until I can find a knock off version for cheaper, I’m stuck with this guy
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for side sleeping during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow, its perfect for me. Not too big and so easy to throw in the wash to fluff back up when it starts to get flattened out from use. I am currently 25 weeks pregnant and bought this around 16 weeks. Normally I sleep on my back but during pregnancy it's better to sleep on your side and it felt way too uncomfortable for me until I got this pillow. Also my back started hurting very early on too, and this was such a life saver. I don't think I'd be able to sleep without this pillow right now.
customer_reviews.author: toothlesstimmy

customer_reviews.title: Must have pregnancy item!
customer_reviews.text: I held off on buying a pregnancy pillow but finally decided to buy it and I have no regrets! I have been using it since July and absolutely love and cannot sleep without it. It is so comfortable with lots of support and just the right size for me at 5 ft. I like how easy it is to zip off the cover and throw it into wash and dryer when it needs to be cleaned which is super convenient. I highly recommend this pillow during pregnancy and I’m sure I will even use it after the baby arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Third trimester must have! If you’re in your third and as miserable as I was trying to get comfortable you need this pillow! I sleep with the thinner end between my legs and the thicker end supports my bump and gives me something to cuddle. I’m so glad I bought this pillow. I was using a giant U shape pregnancy pillow but that became uncomfortable around 30 weeks. BONUS can also be used as a nursing pillow. I definitely recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: AA0902

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to full body pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’m 23 weeks pregnant, and this pillow has alleviated my hip and back pain to help me stay comfortable, so I roll over less and wake up on my back less often. I sleep with the big part between my legs and the little part wedged under the baby bump. It wasn’t stuffed as full/firm as I expected, and the stuffing felt a little uneven, but it’s working great. I love that this pillow takes up less room than the full body options. It arrived packed in a zippered clear plastic case with carry handles, which I’m saving in case I need to travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte eloise

customer_reviews.title: Not pregnant but ideal side sleeping pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’m not pregnant nor planning on it anytime soon. But I changed my sleeping positions in recent months I noticed and this is exactly what I needed. I also lost some weight and sleeping on my side made my knees knock and this again is a perfect solution without knee pillows which are bulky and awkward. It’s cool to touch and just a perfect shape and size ! So comfortable and helps me sleep my best !
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Ramesar

customer_reviews.title: Cozy soft not too bulky oillow
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pregnancy pillow I have purchased and by far my fav. One was just way to cumbersome in my bed especially since I flip back and forth so much. The next was a mini version of the first but still too much oillow for what I needed. This one if just right I can support my growing stomach While also allowing some support for between my legs since side sleeping is my only option. It’s also very soft so I don’t feel as if it’s too much under my belly or legs. Since I began using I’ve had less back pain and less leg cramps. So happy with this. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: So many maternity support pillows are HUGE--this one was exactly the size I needed. It runs from my knees to the top of my bump (I'm only 5'3") and provides the perfect amount of support for my hips and belly without taking over the bed. My only complaint is that I've only used it for the last 2-3 months and the pillow is getting pretty flattened where I sandwich it between by thighs; I'm due in the next few weeks so it's fine, but if I still had a few months to go I'd probably feel like I needed to replace this one. I'd still get another of the same pillow, but for the cost it's a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MR226

customer_reviews.title: Works well but seemed to deflate quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for something to help my hip pain at night. Sleeping or resting on my sides as made my hips more sensitive. I enjoyed the shape more than I thought but after a week, the support seemed to be more floppy. For basically a $40 pillow, I decided I would just get a normal firm pillow for the meantime. I hope they can make the filling more substantial in the future. I hope my Boppy nursing pillow doesn’t have the same trouble.
customer_reviews.author: WVMEG3

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: In theory, this is the right shape, however it just doesn't cut it. The stuffing material is weak, does not provide the needed support, and is not able to be shifted around in the pillow to adjust. Had hoped it would work, but am content just using a regular pillow instead. (Great pattern though!) I even had a friend lie down and try it and she had the same response: did not provide the needed support.
customer_reviews.author: BachMere

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed and effective
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this since the end of my first trimester. It gets packed and accompanies me to weekend outings and other vacations. Basically, I'm saying I can't live comfortably without it. Hopefully, I'll remember to update my review once I've tried using the pillow for breastfeeding, but regardless, it's going to be used long after my pregnancy is over to replace my leg pillow for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not too big and good bump support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option if you don’t have a king-size bed that can fit the u-shaped extra large body pillows on the market. Bump support is great (and I say this as someone with a HUGE belly). Rolling over in bed with the pillow isn’t too onerous. One bit of advice: if you need extra support between your legs then this pillow might not be long enough for you. The filling also separates a bit in the leg support area after using it for a while. If this isn’t a big issue for you, then this pillow would be a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Pamplemousse

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleepers and if you toss and turn!
customer_reviews.text: Got my best night of sleep in a while... I'm a mostly side sleeper but I also toss and turn all night, and this moves easily to readjust throughout the night to keep me comfy. I first tried a full-body U-shaped pregnancy pillow and I felt trapped because I couldn't move. This was so much better, and is small enough that you can still make the bed without it looking like there's a person in there!
customer_reviews.author: Selena Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastfeeding support.
customer_reviews.text: Used this pillow while I was pregnant for sleep but I ended up using it the most after my baby arrived. I used it for breastfeeding. It was way easier to use than the traditional boppy feeding pillow because I had a csection I had tons of abdominal pain, also the traditional boppy doesnt get baby high enough sometimes for a proper latch. Now I'm 11 months postpartum and use it for sleep still lol
customer_reviews.author: Ken & Natasha O.

customer_reviews.title: Great shape, but too soft.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shape of this pillow. I was just using a massive pillow in between my legs and under my belly (I sleep on my sides), and this is a huge improvement. Not too big, but provides the support I need. However, it's too soft, not enough filling. I just end up with filling in each end, and nothing in the middle. :( So, while I like it, I don't know if I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mickus

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow but flattens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow for support. I debated whether I should buy this one or a large body pillow and I’m glad I went with this boppy one. It’s good for supporting my belly as I’m over 20 weeks pregnant, but I’ve noticed it’s already starting to flatten at the smaller end and I’ve only had it a few weeks. It’s not too bad though, nothing a good fluff won’t fix. I have noticed that it’s not very firm, so I will wake up with some aches especially on my legs and bottom from cradling the pillow all night. But I figure it’s better than if I had no pillow at all. I’ll take what I can during pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about my head pillow support.. so I tried the big U shaped maternity pillows but hated the head support! So I needed one that was big enough to support my growing belly, while allowing me to still use my own pillow. This is so much more comfortable to me! Only dilemma, I have to move it with me when I switch sides. And it's not the firmest pillow.. not sure how long it will stay fluffy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect maternity pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this pillow! I didn’t want a maternity pillow that was too big. Most of them look amazing but WAY too big. We have a queen size bed plus the beagle in there- we don’t have any more room for a gigantic pillow. This is the perfect size. I love that you can switch it around and use it in so many different ways. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: BrianneG

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best pillow. I'm so glad my husband found it. I use it between my knees to sleep and it has been the most helpful for that, since it helps me with my restless legs in pregnancy, aligning my hips, and is the right softness for my legs which eases my thigh pain and hip pain. I still cannot get comfortable and do not sleep great at night because my right hip and leg are restless. I just hit the third trimester and have been using this pillow for two months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good for pregnancy and for nursing
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for support while pregnant. Probably could use a little more stuffing and a little more firmness, but overall it worked great and the price is far better than the more expensive popular alternatives. I also used it while nursing the baby as a back up nursing pillow (when I didn't want to lug my regular Boppy nursing pillow around the house).
customer_reviews.author: Pat D

customer_reviews.title: Good for early pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This was great during my first pregnancy when I only gained 30 lbs and weighed only 160 the day I gave birth. It works best for a small baby bump or until you start growing the size of a basketball, but if you have a larger bump like I do with my second pregnancy (already 170 pounds at 31 weeks with a baby measuring 1lb ahead of schedule) this will not give you enough support. Go for the larger Boppy pillow that supports both front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Goodell

customer_reviews.title: This saved me during and after my pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible time sleeping during my pregnancy, and this gave me so much support! I slept with it behind my back, between my legs, under my belly and under my knees. The unique shape makes it so versatile. Now that my son is here, we use it for feeding and propping him up. The material is so soft and comforting. This pillow is a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Myers

customer_reviews.title: Prefect size pillow that relieves pain.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 7 months pregnant and I bought this pillow because I sleep on my side constantly and I needed something to stick between my legs so that I wouldn't get pains in my knees or legs. This pillow is the perfect size. It doesn't take up too much room in bed and it's super comfy too. I also use this pillow for back support when sitting on the couch. I would definitely recommend this pillow to any pregnant women and also people who sleep on their side a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Huckel

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby, too soft for mommy support
customer_reviews.text: The shape is great. It hugs your body. But it’s too soft for my preference. Due to its shape you’d use it the same way every time and where my legs goes it definitely gets flattened quickly. And the fact that it goes between my husband and I even the wider part gets screwed Bc he ends up putting his leg on it too. It will be incredibly soft for baby but for mommy it’s too soft.
customer_reviews.author: TFriends

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pillow during my pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow during my pregnancy. It provides good support for my back, knees and belly without trapping me in my bed like other bigger maternity pillows. Nothing worse than having a giant pillow trapping you when you are really pregnant and it’s 4 am and you have to pee. I actually still use it as a breastfeeding pillow now. Only complaint is that the pillow was pretty fluffy when I first got it but after a while it got pretty flat as the stuffing got worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Richards

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pillow for 3 months + now and can't say that at any point it's worked better than using a regular pillow. The shape seems to do nothing for me. It was soft and lumpy from day one. I thought I'd wait and see before writing a review because several women said that in third trimester it really helped but I'm there now and it's been such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: A. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Huge relief
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the fact I have to physically move this when I have to roll over at night. Other than that this pillow has been amazing relief for my pregnancy uncomforts. Ive been using the thicker part for between my legs and the smaller part for under my belly and it has helped tremendously. I notice a huge difference if I fall asleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: BEST PILLOW EVER...Cannot sleep without it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow!! This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I bought the 1st when I was pregnant with my 3rd child to help support my belly while on bed rest. It's awesome. Now 9 years later, it was flat and had seen much better days. So I purchased a second. It's thick & soft and oh so comfy. I cannot sleep without it. 😊❤👍
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Now I sleep like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for way too long to buy this pillow! I was starting to get uncomfortable and kept tossing and turning at night so I kept researching pregnancy pillows over and over again. I was seriously looking at this one for weeks before I bought it. I heard great things about the bigger pillows but there’s no way one would fit in my bed so I got this one! LOVE IT! I don’t even move at night now! The only problem is my husband is jealous because I’m not cuddling him as much! I’m excited to take it with us traveling too because that was my final straw when we stayed in a hotel and I was SO uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pregnant hips!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 20 weeks pregnant with baby #2. For my first pregnancy I had a pillow that took up most of the bed and I loved it, however, my husband did not! 😂 This pillow is the best compromise! My hips feel supported, my tailbone has stopped aching, I love how soft it is and the removable cover is super cute! As you can see, my senior dog loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kaplch

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow, but I took 1 star away because the stuffing of the pillow really flattened out. It’s not firm or too puffy, but I love the design and fit of the pillow for my belly and to go in between my legs. I had a giant body pillow and it was annoying and uncomfortable- this is much easier to move around in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for a good nights rest
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time sleeping on my side with my pregnancy. This pillow gives me a lot of support and helps keep my body in a neutral position which really alleviates pain in the hips associated with side sleeping. Sleep has definitely improved since my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my second trimester and the reason for getting the pillow it fits well under my belly which is nice and I use it behind my back when I need to sit up in bed. The cover nice and soft and comfy as well. My main reason for purchasing it was for between my legs since my back would be killing me at night and in the morning and it offers little support there. As soon as my knees come together the filling goes flat so I end up having to use another pillow for the support I was hoping to get from this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and high quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! I tried another pillow early on that was long and J-shaped. Not for me! Turning over was way too big of a deal. Plus, the inside was flimsy, cheap feeling, and not particularly supportive. This is the perfect little pillow to flip around with me and the materials actually feel like a pillow I would buy in normal times. And considering how small it is, it does an amazing job of supporting the areas that need support. I’m 31 weeks pregnant, I’ve had this pillow for about a month, and I think it’s one of the few items that will bring me any comfort in this final stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the U shaped pregnancy pillow that is too bulky to sleep with and I couldn’t be more happy. This pillow is the perfect size for between the legs and belly support during pregnancy. I also use it at night raised on my belly before bed to read. I plan on bringing this to the hospital to stay comfortable and to breastfeed. It’s incredibly versatile.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Mommy loved during pregnancy...now baby loves during feeding
customer_reviews.text: I primarily purchase this to help me sleep at night during pregnancy and I’ve definitely got my money’s worth since it also came in handy for breastfeeding. Love that the jersey cover can easily be removed and cleaned. Has kept its shape and comfiness
customer_reviews.author: First Time Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great pregnancy through nursing pillow
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend who got the pillow during her pregnancy then used for nursing. She liked it because she thought it was softer and more comfortable than the other Boppy and nursing pillows she tried. Her son, now 2, still uses and loves it. So far I love it too. I’m six months pregnant and it really helps at night. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad quality product, but I wasn't for me. I needed something a little longer that fits between my legs and my arms. I ended up needing to use a pillow to hold on to and the hoppy in between my legs which made turning a chore. The whole point of buying it was convenience and comfort, which it didn't end up offering me. I returned it after one night. It was too soft for me as well and I didn't feel like it offered me much in the way of support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't handle a huge pregnancy pillow in bed so this size seemed great, and it is. It allows for knee and leg support as well as belly support. One downside is you have to move it when you want to move, but with the small size it is not too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Orris

customer_reviews.title: Great in between pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cozy pillow. I was looking for a pregnancy pillow that wasn’t as big as me but would add comfort when laying in bed. I love that the cover comes off for easy cleaning. It does a great job supporting my knees to ease lower back and hip pain. I was hoping it’d support my belly more but doesn’t quite come up enough since I am so tall. Overall very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with this pillow because I didnt one one that took up the whole bed and the side support pillow just didnt seem to be big enough. The first few nights it felt great. However as time has gone on the pillow is pretty flat in places. I have ended up having to utilize an extra pillow between my legs at night because this one is just too flat and doesnt really provide the needed support.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great shape, but flattens out easily
customer_reviews.text: Great shape to place one end between the legs and the other for either back or stomach support. Easy to remove cover and wash (which was necessary because this arrived with a strong smell). However I started using this around 120 lb, now up to 135, and it has flattened out quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago and I have a month left before delivery (or so we hope!). This pillow has been my saving grace for sleep, I can't recommend it enough. My friend gave me her wedge and this with the wedge allow me to sleep as comfortably as possible without waking up on my back. When I don't use this pillow, I almost always wake up on my back and end up with sore hips. The shape allows me to use it in many different ways depending on where I feel sore or where I could use more support. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Nessun26

customer_reviews.title: Finally a comfortable night’s sleep
customer_reviews.text: Right before I ordered this pillow, I kept waking up in the middle of the night with leg and hip pain. I now have been sleeping through most of the night, painlessly. Also, bonus perk: My dog sleeps in our bed with us and sometimes she accidentally kicks me. I’m always afraid she’s going to kick my belly, but since I use the pillow to support my belly she can’t! Lol So win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna James

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product... I bought it to support my hips and stomach while pregnant without taking over my whole bed. Well I haven't even had it a week and it is already so flat there is absolutely no point in me using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and versatility, but wears down quickly
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it's great - my husband is much larger than me so I couldn't go for one.if the larger options. However, the material inside the pillow is very soft and mushy, so it's already flattening and wearing down in the spots that are supposed to provide the most support. I may have to purchase a different one as the pain I bought this to alleviate is starting to come back. Overall great option for the price of you have a small bed or a tall or big partner though. Got me through several weeks of discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Young

customer_reviews.title: My friend during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Made my pregnancy days very comfortable. I carry it with me even when i am traveling. Cant imagine living without it. Only down side after removing cover for wash putting it back in the old shape is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Debanjana Roy

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pillow I liked to use while pregnant. Enough support for the belly and small enough to toss and turn with and not take up the entire bed like the pregnancy body pillows. The only down side is the fluffing inside would constantly move up to the bigger end - therefor every night before bed I’d have to pull the fluff back down. I even considered cutting it open and adding more stuffing myself to see if it would help (never did though). I’d still recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: elyssa letourneau

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT, IDEAL! Should have bought it SOONER!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously amazing, I should have bought it sooner. I spent a lot of time finding the one with the overall best reviews and one that wasn’t going to take up the whole bed and not be uncomfortable for my fiancé. This is perfect size and gives best support. Being able to use it for tummy and back support is really convenient and makes it ideal. I loved it so much I bought it for my cousin and who is also pregnant and she loves it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hullender

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect pillow to ease my back pain while not kicking ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pillow to ease my back pain while not kicking my husband out of the bed! The large pregnancy pillows are just not reasonable with two people in one bed, and the one that I have (a snoogle?) is too firm for me. This pillow is perfectly soft and easy to move around to different positions.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Very versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been my best friend the last couple of months. I love that it's not huge like the other pregnancy pillows I looked at since I share a bed with my husband and two dogs. Plus the cover is removable so washing is easy. It's very versatile and can be flipped or rotated to fit the right position you need to be comfortable. I even use it while sitting to read or watch TV. I've also been playing with it and believe I will be able to use it for a breastfeeding support pillow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: Great size compared to the other big pillows however, didn't support anything. It was so flat when I tried it kinda pointless to the whole work SUPPORT in the Description. I am returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Love it But...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pillow on a daily basis for about a month and a half. It already seems super flat and lumpy compared to day 1. I almost have to fold it in half at night now. I have loved it up until this point. I love the size of the pillow. I've slept with it in many different positions. Its the perfect shape for me. Just saddening its already flat and lumpy. I'm only 21 weeks... I have so much more to go on this pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCosh

customer_reviews.title: Great price, durable, multiple function use
customer_reviews.text: I used it through out my pregnancy due to the weight of my belly I started getting a lot of back pain. With my last pregnancy I used a smaller pillow that only went under my stomach or between my legs. With this pillow I was able to accommodate my belly and support for my legs for a more even posture. And now after giving birth I still use it for support feeding the baby and the baby also sleeps on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: SYN

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Helpful pillow to get comfy in bed while pregnant but I did end up buying the Snoogle after since this one wasn't quite large enough. I thought this smaller version would be easier to maneuver in the bed which it was but if you have space in the bed, go for the Snoogle.
customer_reviews.author: LEDNY

customer_reviews.title: doesnt stay fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for a couple months and its just a pillow I'll use for my head and not really for the baby bump or support, It's flattening which I thought would at least last through the pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: jenny3085

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, use a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 7 1/2 months pregnant. I bought this to help with the round ligament pain I’ve been experiencing. The idea of it is great, I can see how it would be a relief and very comfortable. However the stuffing seems to have flattened quite a bit due to it being very soft. There’s no real support. I get more support using a regular pillow than this. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! We have a queen bed and so I didn’t want to purchase a big bulky pillow while I was pregnant but i needed something to help me sleep. This pillow saved my life. It’s a great size for those who want something smaller than the average maternity pillow. Plus I use it to breastfeed now! I bought this pillow 4 months before our little one came and it held up and still works great as a nursing pillow. My baby even loves to lay on my lap with the pillow engulfing her. Overall It’s a great pillow. I’d recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jdb

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but goes flat quickly
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been very helpful in getting sleep during pregnancy, but after 3 months of use it has started to become flat and misshapen and not have much support. I’m disappointed as it was a comfortable pillow and great for people who like to switch sides in the middle of the night and like their own pillow for their head.
customer_reviews.author: David B Chester

customer_reviews.title: Good size, but soft
customer_reviews.text: I'm not pregnant but I needed a body pillow like pillow, but smaller due to limited space on the bed. This pillow works pretty well, my only real complaint is that it's to soft. I use the big part as an additional pillow, and the smaller part is what what "snuggle" throughout the night. It's also small enough thst when a switch sides it's easy to take with me.
customer_reviews.author: AndieZ

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that helped me sleep in third trimester!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pillow for pregnancy, as well as breastfeeding support. I like it much better than the standard boppy nursing pillow and it’s much easier to use/versatile for my husband to hold on his lap as well.
customer_reviews.author: JTA

customer_reviews.title: the material gets pretty lumpy after only after a few months
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I thought the main purpose of this pillow is to go under your belly to support it. Well, it’s far too thick to do that. Plus, the material gets pretty lumpy after only after a few months. This is my second (had one with my first pregnancy) and both seemed to break down into sacks of fluffy cotton balls. I’m trying a new brand in my 8th month because this pillow is doing next to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: goob

customer_reviews.title: Essential Item During Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from pregnancy insomnia. This pillow has been a godsend! I can't sleep without it. It's perfect size, not too big. However I wish it was a little bit more firm. I feel like it's wearing down a bit after 2-3 months. But I still find it essential for any pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Rubidoe

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very nice! I love that it gives me support, but doesn't take up the whole bed! The only thing bad I can say is that the smaller part of the pillow could possible use a little more filling as is flattens when between the legs. Overall, I love the pillow and it makes sleeping so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flood

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. Have used a full size body pillow in the past and much prefer this size. Happy I ordered in my early second trimester because being 19 weeks today I cannot imagine sleeping without it. Very comfortable, light eight, supporting, and can easily switch sides in my sleep without a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: MariaZ

customer_reviews.title: Best Pregnancy Pillow
customer_reviews.text: The best pregnancy pillow out there! I have tried so many other options that were terrible (too big, too hard or too soft). This one is the perfect size, and light enough to easily change your sleeping side during the night, and it is the perfect amount of support and softness! I only wish I had found this one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: HLynn

customer_reviews.title: Best maternity pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It's not too hard or soft. It's the perfect size. The covering is also really soft. A lot of the other maternity pillows were simply too big and hard for me to sleep on but I was extremely comfortable the first night with this. I can't sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed when I got this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed when I got this pillow; was really looking forward to finding something to help support my belly at night. I find that it feels a bit too flimsy, doesn't feel very supportive at all, and not quite long enough for me. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No longer works (20weeks)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for more than a month now, since I was 15 weeks or so...I am waking now with hip and cervix pain. The pillow already went flat and doesn’t support
customer_reviews.author: Karla M

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow but smelly
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow a lot. I’m petite and it’s a good size for me. However, it arrived with a terrible smell. I’m going to have to air in out and wash the cover first. If only it didn’t smell...
customer_reviews.author: happiness

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is great overall. I just wish it was a little wider/thicker in the end that goes between the legs. I didn’t realize how helpful the under belly support was until I went on vacation and slept with a regular pillow for leg support. I like the size of it, many pregnancy pillows are huge and take up the space of a third person in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pillow! Was having a hard time sleeping with a growing belly at 18 weeks, and this solved the problem. No more aches and pains!
customer_reviews.author: luckycarms03

customer_reviews.title: No period? Try this comma!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pregnancy support pillow that wouldn't take up the whole bed. This one is the perfect size! I use it between my legs at night and underneath my belly while sitting—both very comfortable. It is less firm than I thought, but that makes it more flexible. The machine washable cover is a plus. Seems like it will last throughout my pregnancy as I am 5 months pregnant now. Embrace the comma, friends!
customer_reviews.author: CorgiQueen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pillow
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite pillow. I got first one as a gift when I was pregnant and loved it. Then I used it to nurse my baby. And then my husband stole it from me. So I had to buy another one for my second baby
customer_reviews.author: Namie

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow, okay quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow much better than the full body pillow as it's much easier to roll over and doesn't completely dominate the bed. Definitely supports the baby bump while I'm sleeping in a way a regular pillow couldn't (I tried to improvise when I forgot to bring this pillow on a couple trips and a standard pillow just doesn't compare). The quality is okay, would be nice if the part that goes between your legs didn't lose filling so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Magical Shrimp Pillow! 🍤🍤
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this at bedtime, but I used it at the kitchen table yesterday for back support while doing computer homework! I love how supportive it is without being bulky and obnoxious. My cat sleeps on it with me 😂 My daughter said it looks like a shrimp, so now I call it my shrimp pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought my first pillow 7 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought a same pillow 7 years ago when I was pregnant and love it so much. I use it every night even after I gave birth. It’s such an awesome body pillow. This is the second pillow I bought and I’m glad the quality and the firmness is still the same.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small pregnancy pillow to love but this isn’t it. The belly support portion of the pillow is super thick - I can’t imagine my belly will actually lay on it until well into the 3rd trimester. On the other hand, the part that goes between your legs is so thin and offers very little support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support for knees, lumpy
customer_reviews.text: There isn't enough support for between my knees so I still have hip pain. The pillow is lumpy, not much better then a regular body pillow except you don't find to wrap it under your belly. I wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Chenelle86

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product just needs to be little bigger . I enjoy being able to put in between my legs just wish it went to my ankles too. Helps if you don’t need both back and belly support at same time. Def good investment. Small and easy to take around house do like that.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Used my
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife so she could sleep comfortably during pregnancy. I used it when she went to work and.....bought one for myself. It just helps with hip and overall comfort while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: James Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape. My wife has owned 3 of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shape. My wife has owned 3 of these since we were pregnant with our first baby in 2009. She uses them every night - even though she’s not pregnant now. The only issue with them is that they do lose their loft quickly, & they’re expensive: hence 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: DatabaseGangsta

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pillow! I knew I wouldn't like the big body pillows and this pillow does a great job. The cover is soft and I like that you can remove it for washing. The pillow is not very firm but it does the job just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but flat.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's not too big and can be used in different ways. It would have been nice to have a little more support for the filling, itseems to flatten out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Darsel Christenson

customer_reviews.title: My first pregnancy pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the large pregnancy pillows looked huge. It has been great so far and helps me keep my hips aligned and helps me from rolling onto my back because you cannot when you are pregnant. I only wish maybe it was more of a memory foam material that keeps shape. But overall I would recommend it to friends if they don’t want that huge pregnancy pillow on the bed!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Definitely regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: It was a really great pillow for a few days. My wife used it in place of a regular pillow for her knees while in her late first/early second trimesters. But in about 5 days it was too smashed in the middle and is not useless for that area. It was still good for under her belly, but she didn't need it for that as much.
customer_reviews.author: CB Harness

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very comfortable. It does trap so much heat at night though, my legs are always sweating. I’ll most likely use this pillow for breast feeding when baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4life

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: Much more convenient for me than the larger lounge type support pillows. I use this every single night (pregnant!) and it works perfectly for a variety of sleeping positions. It has a soft cover and isn't too firm.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pillow too!
customer_reviews.text: Best nursing pillow too. I prefer this pillow to the regular boppy and mybreastfriend pillows. Softer, with more give for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Wells

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AWESOME! It is super soft and yet somehow still ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! It is super soft and yet somehow still supportive. I stick this in between my legs while I sleep so I have a little support under the belly on one side and the tail bone on the back. Can't live without it now!
customer_reviews.author: Julauch

customer_reviews.title: Needs more filling/stuffing
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I got this was to have a pillow for between my legs to help with lower back pain due to pregnancy. However, there is barely any support in the pillow and it does not really help. I have liked it more as neck support pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Seijo

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It worked really good but i used it so much that the inside was starting to get thinned out but it lasted a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Emina Smailagic

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell out of the package
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this pillow. There was a terrible chemical smell when I took it out of the package. So I let it air out a couple of days, but it still smelled. I have a feeling that even if I had washed it (which I didn't want to, if I was going to return it), the smell would have stayed. It was really strong. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Citygirl927

product_meta.title: Boppy Pregnancy Support Pillow, Petite Trellis Gray and White, Body Pillow with removable jersey cover
product_meta.description:
Not too big, not too small, just right. The Boppy Pregnancy Support Pillow is a smaller-sized body pillow provides just the right support for hips, legs and bump. This pregnancy pillow offers the comfort and support mom needs without taking over the bed. So versatile, mom can even use it in a chair, on the couch or relaxing in bed.

Product care: Upholstered: Use commercial size washer and dryer. Machine wash delicate cycle, 30°C/85°F. Tumble dry low on delicate cycle. Do not bleach. While drying pillow, throw a sneaker or tennis ball (wrapped in a pillow case) in the dryer to help the pillow keep its shape. Do not iron. Do not dry clean. Jersey: Machine wash slipcover separately, delicate cycle, 30°C/85°F. Bleach as needed. Tumble dry low on delicate cycle. Cool iron as needed. Do not dry
feature_bullets: SIDE SLEEPING LIVESAVER: The Boppy Pregnancy Support Body Pillow doubles up on comfort with dual support. Support for your back and legs, baby bump and legs, or head and neck.
SPACE-SAVING SIZE: The compact medium-sized pregnancy pillow saves space in your bed, while maintaining the comfort and relief you need.
VERSATILE, MULTI-USE: Versatile little supporter helps you get comfy while sleeping, but also while lounging or sitting. Great for a growing baby bump or even post-partum recovery.
EASY CARE, MACHINE WASHABLE: Machine washable pillow and easy zip on and off, ultra-soft jersey removable cover for easy care.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars493 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
